title: Understanding Privacy Laws
text: Privacy laws are designed to protect personal information, but they can also create challenges for companies and engineers.

title: Privacy Terms as Blockers
text: Privacy terms can be seen as obstacles, making it difficult for users to understand and agree to them.

title: Engineers and Privacy Concerns
text: There is a perception that engineers prioritize functionality over privacy, which can lead to mistrust.

title: Combining the Effects
text: Consider how both the complexity of privacy terms and the perception of engineers contribute to a lose-lose situation.
choices: They make the privacy terms look like blockers
They create the narrative that engineers do not care about privacy
